project_name.description:
Please provide a unique name for this project.
project_name
project_name.pattern_match_failure_message: Name must consist of letters, numbers, dashes, and underscores.

artifacts_dest_path.description:
Please provide the Volumes destination path in Databricks where the directory will be created containing the JAR and other artifacts to store. [example: /Volumes/abcdef1234567890].
Note: Your admin must allowlist the Volumes JAR path you specify for your workspace (see https://docs.databricks.com/en/data-governance/unity-catalog/manage-privileges/allowlist.html)
artifacts_dest_path.pattern_match_failure_message: Path must be of the form ^/Volumes(?:/[a-z0-9_-]+)+$
